BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of sick time earned by employees.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provision of sick time earned by employees.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 97-A, in relation to the provision of sick time earned by employees.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 97-A - Provision of sick time earned by employees.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of sick time earned by employees.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Provision of sick time earned by employees.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 97-A, in relation to the provision of sick time earned by employees.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be Filed by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 97-A - Provision of sick time earned by employees.
